author: sussman
msg: Add an entry for CollabNet Subversion.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Don't wait for the timeout to deal with 204/304's without a body.
Seen with commits against httpd's without an ErrorDocument for 204/304 (such as
Requires r1082 of serf to propogate the 204/304 correctly.
(handle_response): Support a 204/304 properly instead of waiting forever.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Fix pool lifetime bug with the checksum attribute.
(start_replay): Copy the checksum to a pool that'll live long enough.

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Correct formatting.

author: dlr
msg: Do some prep work for Apache 2.3+ compatibility.  This is not yet
functional under 2.3+ (due to the error condition mentioned in the
inline comment), it gets us most of the way there, with only one or
two last kinks to work out.
When writing the config file, use the new LoadModule declarations.
Add a commented-out "Require all granted" directive (which causes
problems with 2.2-).  Describe the "couldn't check user" failure
